id.description: Unique identifier of the job post.

active.description: Flag indicating if the job post is active or not.

live.description: Flag indicating if the job post is live or not.

first_published_at.description: Date and time when the job post was first published.

title.description: Title or headline of the job post.

office_id.description: ID of the office associated with the location.

id.description: Unique identifier of the location type.

internal.description: Flag indicating if the job post is internal or not.

external.description: Flag indicating if the job post is external or not.

job_id.description: ID of the job associated with the job post.

content.description: Content or description of the job post.

internal_content.description: Internal content or description of the job post.

updated_at.description: Date and time when the job post was last updated.

created_at.description: Date and time when the job post was created.

demographic_question_set_id.description: ID of the demographic question set associated with the job post.

required.description: Flag indicating if the question is required or not.

private.description: Flag indicating if the question is private or not.

label.description: Label or title of the question.

type.description: Type of the question (e.g., text, dropdown, etc).
